text: naneun geudaedeul(yudaeindeul)gwa seong-yag-eul maej-eoss-eumyeo geudaedeul wilo san-eul deul-eo ollyeossnola. (hananimkkeseo malsseumhasigil) “naega geudaedeul-ege jun geos-eul himkkeos badgo (naui mal-eul) deul-eula.” geudeul-i malhagil “ulineun deul-eoss-euna bulbogjonghayeossseubnida.” geudeul-ui bulsin-eulo malmiam-a geudeul-ui ma-eum sog-eneun song-ajiga seumyeodeul-eossnola. geudae(muhammadeuyeo!)neun malhala : ‘geudaedeul-i midneun jadeul-ilamyeon geudaedeul mid-eum-i myeonghaneun geos-i cham-eulo saaghadoda!’
